Uses of Class
rr.event.AccessEvent

  • Packages that use AccessEvent 
    Package Description
    rr.event  
    rr.simple  
    rr.tool  

    • Uses of AccessEvent in rr.event

      Subclasses of AccessEvent in rr.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayAccessEvent
      An Event representing an array access (read or write) operation of the target program.
      class  FieldAccessEvent
      Represents field accesses (reads or writes) performed by the target program.
      class  VolatileAccessEvent
      Represents an access to a volatile variable by the target program.

    • Uses of AccessEvent in rr.simple

    • Uses of AccessEvent in rr.tool

      Methods in rr.tool with parameters of type AccessEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Tool.access(AccessEvent fae)
      Called for each access event (read or write) in the target program.
      protected void Tool.advance(AccessEvent ae)
      A tool should should call this method when it no longer cares about the location touched by the access event.
      ShadowVar Tool.makeShadowVar(AccessEvent ae)
      Return a fresh variable state for this tool for the location being accessed.
